The James 'Whitey' Bulger trial

Judge to jury: Reach verdicts on all acts

Prodded by prosecutors, US District Court Judge Denise Casper told jurors they must go through 33 criminal acts -- 19 murders and 14 others -- and try to reach unanimous verdicts on each. (10:46 a.m.)

Mom of man killed by police: A 'very good kid'

The mother of the 20-year-old Brockton man killed during an exchange of gunfire with Boston police Wednesday said her son grew into a follower and chose the wrong friends. (12:25 p.m.)

Amy Lord's family is thankful for the outpouring of support they have received since the death of their daughter.

Toyota recalls pickups

Toyota is recalling 342,000 Tacoma midsize pickup trucks because the front seat belts can malfunction.

Business & Money

Fannie Mae posts $10.1b net income for 2nd quarter

The mortgage giant said the rise in home prices during the quarter enabled it to reduce its reserves set aside for losses on mortgages, helping boost its net income.
